# Acid Storm (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Creation Spells|creation]]) \[[[Acid Spells|acid]]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 11th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 11]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a flask of acid \[10 gp])

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Area:** Cylinder (20-ft. radius, 20 ft. high)

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Reflex half

**Spell Resistance:** No 

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 7

*A dark green cloud whirls into being before unleashing a shower of foul-smelling, yellow-green rain.*

Acid rain deals 1d6 points of acid damage per caster level (maximum 15d6) to each creature in the area.
